choices.C: Configure the ALB to forward only requests that contain the custom HTTP header.

choices.C: Store the API key value in Amazon DynamoDB. In the template, replace all references to the value with {{resolve:dynamodb:MyTableName:MyPrimaryKey}}.
choices.D: Store the API key value in a new Amazon S3 bucket. In the template, replace all references to the value with {{resolve:s3:MyBucketName:MyObjectName}}.

Not A. {{resolve:ssm:MySSMParameterName:1}} 
ssm: Systems Manager Parameter Store plaintext parameter.
